body:
I simply countered some random that accused me of not being black and being a racist just because I said that 'black people commit most crimes, and that makes me furious at other black people'.

Since they insulted me, I countered with the best insults I could think of, so I get IP banned.

Also the user had replied as such already to several of my posts, and gone through my post history to attack me for anything she didnt like in the screenshot.

Is this also what Ruqqus is going to do? I can and already have posted photos of body parts other than my face to prove I am black ... and no nothing of what your dirty minds might be thinking of, like holding my username on a piece of paper showing my black hand, but even that isnt enough to stop people whitewashing me online.

I am happy to do that in this thread for you if you want and if it is requested. But I dont see why I am not allowed to say any kind of insults I want to anyone that accuses me of being non black and racist in the first place.

P.S. while the rest of the discussion above what is screenshotted isnt shown, my comment about black on black crime was on topic and relevant to the thread, and as you can see from the replies, most people there were on my side too.

title: This is all it took to get me IP blocked from Saidit, is Ruqqus similar?

body:
You posted stupid racist shit and told someone to go hang themselves, and you're surprised you got banned? 

Saidit doesn't want to become like Voat and I hope Ruqqus doesn't become like Voat either, since that would mean the death of both sites. 

Should you be banned if you post similar dumb shit here? **No.** But don't be surprised if people just block you instead; being blocked on Ruqqus means you won't be able reply to the blockers own content and comments. Think of it as a kind of shadowban.
body_html:
You posted stupid racist shit and told someone to go hang themselves, and you're surprised you got banned?

Saidit doesn't want to become like Voat and I hope Ruqqus doesn't become like Voat either, since that would mean the death of both sites.

body:
i hear you cannot incite violence.

i personally am not offended by statistics.. but labelling entire groups seems to be counter-productive in any quest as it immediately pegs you as someone that does this to people and hence can be overlooked.

the more calmly and detached you speak about such topics without room for personal (or ego) gain helps you cause to point things out.

body:
I didn't think saidit had rules like that. Maybe the recent tensions have changed their mind.

On Ruqqus someone did get banned for inciting violence, everyone remembers them being a troll but the admins can't say what they did because it's illegal. Ruqqus is small so it's very easy for them to get into legal trouble. The only other user I know of that's banned was an account dedicated to doxxing somebody.

post.title: This is all it took to get me IP blocked from Saidit, is Ruqqus similar?

body:
The thing is telling someone to kys isn't inciting violence. The person I said it to was already stalking my post history and crying about everything instead of simply blocking it. This isn't even illegal in SJW nanny state UK, as the law here literally says they have to block you first and you have to continue messaging them after that. If someone even simply calls me an idiot, under UK law it's free real estate for me to say anything I like back. If they don't block me then no crime is happening.

So while this happened on Saidit, it always remains a concern that other such sites will also start doing the same regardless of such things not even being illegal just because of how much the snowflakes will whine. Any attempt to log back into Saidit to make any kind of appeal or explanation leads to Magnora blocking that IP. I couldn't even read the messages saying I had been banned there without using TOR.

author.bio_html: GM of +ClownWorld +News +Commentary +Conspiracy +Christianity +ProLife +Conservatives +MAGA and a few others

body: I think you'll find Ruqqus is generally more open to conversation, but people don't like being attacked or all x people are like this (as that simply isn't true). We are happy to have conversation that is realistic and constructive though, so just try and raise your level of contribution. A proper rebuttal is not a call for someone to die. And I get chan/kun hazing, but people aren't going to be down for that here and it's just a really unproductive response. The community here do have the ability to exile users or kick posts, so if you tick them off you may be exiled from their guild. It's like in real life if you are difficult to be around, people won't you around, but I do think the users of ruqqus have a pretty high tolerance under free speech in what they are generously willing to put up with. You will be banned or temp banned sitewide if you break these rules: https://ruqqus.com/help/rules

body:
because the alternative is to lose your center and act like an idiot .. 

i'm always being attacked for my beliefs because they challenge others preconceived notions.

does it make me happy ?  no

but I have no problem defending myself, because if I am wrong I DON'T CARE..  i just change.. fix it..

I actually will thank you for pointing out my error.

I feel strongly that allowing my ideas to be torched on the internet makes them stronger if they survive.

and often I refine my understanding thru discussion that helps me clarify my own position.

parent.body: I think you'll find Ruqqus is generally more open to conversation, but people don't like being attacked or all x people are like this (as that simply isn't true). We are happy to have conversation that is realistic and constructive though, so just try and raise your level of contribution. A proper rebuttal is not a call for someone to die. And I get chan/kun hazing, but people aren't going to be down for that here and it's just a really unproductive response. The community here do have the ability to exile users or kick posts, so if you tick them off you may be exiled from their guild. It's like in real life if you are difficult to be around, people won't you around, but I do think the users of ruqqus have a pretty high tolerance under free speech in what they are generously willing to put up with. You will be banned or temp banned sitewide if you break these rules: https://ruqqus.com/help/rules

body:
Yes, I'm not going to disagree with you on that (objective statistics). 

I think it is true that some very powerful people who have a great influence over world affairs happen to be jewish and likely there are many people who have connections in places of power and fraternal/social ties that are elites who are also jewish. There may in fact be some jewish supremacists. But I don't think that because of race, I think that's because they are power and control hungry elites and they come in all kinds. And there are regular jewish people who have nothing to with that. The Clinton crime family isn't Jewish and yet they have had great power. See also: Bloodlines of the Illuminati. If are able to speak in more nuance people are more likely to be able to understand your perspective and take what you have to say more seriously. That is my recommendation from someone who spends time in the area of conspiracy like information/content as well and hopes we can deal with the elites and pedophiles. I also recommend not fighting fire with fire and disengaging with hostile people. Trolls go away when they are bored and you can block people here. 

Anyway I hope you enjoy using ruqqus and will be a nice member of the community. I think you will enjoy the discussions here.

author.bio:
The world is a crazy, wonderful place to create any kind of experience you want.

Seems best tho, if you don't want to get hurt.. to listen to God, listen to your heart, and do what is right, always.
author.bio_html:
The world is a crazy, wonderful place to create any kind of experience you want.

Seems best tho, if you don't want to get hurt.. to listen to God, listen to your heart, and do what is right, always.

body:
label yourself if you please, but you are a human being, a manifestation of light with limitless potential to change and adapt as you see fit.

anything you see as a weakness, can be trained away with effort and focus, and God.

if I felt I was autistic.. first true autistic people don't seem to be able to self reflect.. if you can self-reflect.. you can change.

be straight forward and honest.  and listen more than you speak.  

folks that try and give you labels.. that speaks more about them.

folks that accept these labels and run with them (their friends..)  i would walk away from.

they love to get a reaction.. they are button pushers.  i grew up with a brother that pushed ALL my buttons..

until I disabled them.  now he is almost afraid of me because I can push his buttons at will...

in all his 'power' he never spent any time working on himself (because he was so successful)

now it is catching up with him, in a weird way.  I am not actually that happy about it..

i loved to play with him, now he doesn't want to play anymore because I keep my focus and his shit talking is a waste of time.

and when it doesn't work it makes him look bad.. see he doesn't like to lose, never learned how..

i just love to play.  

>do your best. 
> that is all anyone can ask, or you can offer (gohan.. goku's grandpa said that ;)

if you take life as it comes, do your best in every moment.

the best you can do is to remain centered .. balanced... calm .. and create instead of react.

know what you want to create is always helpful..

my list includes

peace, love, happiness

these things will also have good returns.

if you are being onery, mischief, mad, angry, jealous...

you will get bad returns.. and possible get in trouble.. 

meditation will relieve you of mental stress.

i used some tapes called 'hemisync' .. needs headphones.. but wow.  it was awesome

first time i really felt the mind-body-soul thing clearly.. i watched my body fall asleep .. i felt my mind rest.. i was there 

i am not my mind.  i am spirit.. God... the awareness that is.

I hope for you peace and happiness.  i feel i have a bubble of wellness protecting me.. the world is a crazy place..

walk with God and you'll be alright ; )

btw... i think God protects the innocent.. but once you know it is wrong... it is WRONG.  and you suffer consequences.. by your own hand... 

but if you are doing your best, and listen to yourself and your best interests and you feel God in your heart..

from that place you can always find what is best to do.

ok friend, I've done my best to rely what I can.

post.body:
I simply countered some random that accused me of not being black and being a racist just because I said that 'black people commit most crimes, and that makes me furious at other black people'.

Since they insulted me, I countered with the best insults I could think of, so I get IP banned.

Also the user had replied as such already to several of my posts, and gone through my post history to attack me for anything she didnt like in the screenshot.

Is this also what Ruqqus is going to do? I can and already have posted photos of body parts other than my face to prove I am black ... and no nothing of what your dirty minds might be thinking of, like holding my username on a piece of paper showing my black hand, but even that isnt enough to stop people whitewashing me online.

I am happy to do that in this thread for you if you want and if it is requested. But I dont see why I am not allowed to say any kind of insults I want to anyone that accuses me of being non black and racist in the first place.

P.S. while the rest of the discussion above what is screenshotted isnt shown, my comment about black on black crime was on topic and relevant to the thread, and as you can see from the replies, most people there were on my side too.

body:
i would bet you had a shitty home life.  did you feel safe and secure?

these are the things we need to grow.

without them we go into survival mode.

getting the proper sleep is also a requirement.

there really is no argument here, none of these basic things can be replaced by a drug.

i don't much like my friends that went onto drugs like that.. they became distant.  sure they 'got shit done' just I didn't want to hang out with them.. because they were no longer who I knew.. but this incredibly focused but not giving a shit about anyone else person.

guess i like a bit o' attention.

give your attention to another for no reason.

but to listen and be there.

an exercise to improve your life.

Those people that have made it had therapy and medication to do so.

post.body:
I simply countered some random that accused me of not being black and being a racist just because I said that 'black people commit most crimes, and that makes me furious at other black people'.

Since they insulted me, I countered with the best insults I could think of, so I get IP banned.

Also the user had replied as such already to several of my posts, and gone through my post history to attack me for anything she didnt like in the screenshot.

Is this also what Ruqqus is going to do? I can and already have posted photos of body parts other than my face to prove I am black ... and no nothing of what your dirty minds might be thinking of, like holding my username on a piece of paper showing my black hand, but even that isnt enough to stop people whitewashing me online.

I am happy to do that in this thread for you if you want and if it is requested. But I dont see why I am not allowed to say any kind of insults I want to anyone that accuses me of being non black and racist in the first place.

P.S. while the rest of the discussion above what is screenshotted isnt shown, my comment about black on black crime was on topic and relevant to the thread, and as you can see from the replies, most people there were on my side too.
